text: My Beloved () is a 1958 Soviet movie directed by Iosif Kheifits.Стать- героиняДорогой мой человек It stars Aleksey Batalov, Inna Makarova, and Pyotr Konstantinov. == References == ==Other websites== * Category:1958 drama movies Category:Soviet drama movies Category:Movies directed by Iosif Kheifits
title: My Beloved (movie)
